title: Understanding Print Area
text: The print area is the specific part of your worksheet that you want to print. You can set this area to ensure only the selected range is printed.

title: Locating the Print Area Option
text: The 'Set Print Area' option is usually found under the 'Page Layout' tab in most spreadsheet applications.

hintAnswer: select the range, click "set print area" and click file to open the Backstage view
title: Steps to Set Print Area
text: To set the print area, first select the range you want to print. Then, click on 'Set Print Area' under the 'Page Layout' tab. Finally, click 'File' to open the Backstage view.
choices: select the range, click "set print area" and click file to open the Backstage view
